name: Smuggler's Run (itch)
description:
A game built for GMTK 2020 Game Jam: Out of Control

A tiny arcade racer: Avoid the EMP mines as you run a 10km course. Don't start early and stay inside the beacons: Your time will be penalized.

Controls:

  • W: Forward thrust
  • S: Reverse thrust
  • A: Left lateral thrust
  • D: Right lateral thrust
  • Q: Anti-clockwise rotation
  • E: Clockwise rotation

Built with ppb and briefcase in Python 3.8.

Music by Abstraction, track is Ludum Dare 28 - Track 3 Website: abstractionmusic.com

Sound effects built with https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com

Font by Gustavo Paz

Assets by Kenney
